column4: Does Konversation has a list of users in the channel?  Cause I can't find that in XChat
Yes, it does by default.  And if I remember correctly, XChat's user list is there, but it's hidden by being sized down too much.
lol thanks.  I feel bad that I just got owned by a sizing bar I been staring at for 10 minutes
Yeah, took me forever to figure that one out too ;)
